name: Hominy Nuts
keywords: corn oil, hominy, salt, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound dry hominy, washed and thoroughly dried

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a skillet to 375 degrees. Fry the hominy in 1/2-cup batches until golden, about 1 to 2 minutes per batch. Remove from the skillet and drain on paper towels. Add salt to taste and lime juice if desired. Allow to cool.
